title: New York City X V2.3
description:
Installation:
Simply execute the installer. The scenery will be automatically added to the Flight Simulator Scenery Library. Our installer provides you additional optional features during install. To select different options or different sims, simply run the installer again.

Scenery features:
2500sq km area with high resolution (30cm-1m/pix) seasonal and night ground textures with autogen and 5m mesh, including Jersey City, Newark and all 5 boroughs of New York
Over 6300 custom, photoreal buildings from Manhattan, Brooklyn, Bronx, Jersey City and Newark
10 heliports in the area including 4 detailed
Highly advanced performance-friendly design, numerous optimization techniques used as well as Lite Texture Packs provided for various elements of the scenery
A dedicated entertaining mission featuring Hudson emergency ditching
Harbours, ships, boats and ferries, wave effects, hundrieds of fuel storage tanks, custom car traffic and tons of other things to discover.
Perfect for general, business and commercial aviation as well as microlight and helicopter flying.

Compatibility:
Compatible with vector add-ons (FTX Global Vector), mesh add-ons (FS Global), airport scenery add-ons (KJFK by FSDT) and visual add-ons (FTX Global)
Fully compatible with New York Airports X by Drzewiecki Design
FSX, FSX:SE,FSW, P3Dv1, P3Dv2, P3Dv3, P3Dv4


And fellas, Dare 2 Seed!
